text: The best pizza place around by far!! The service has also been great as well as the prices! Check them out if you haven‚Äôt you won‚Äôt be disappointed!!

text: Best pizza in LR! Every time we go in, we are greeted with a smile and a friendly face. Customer service is always at 100%. I LOVE that they open your pizza box in front of you to show and make sure you received the correct pizza you ordered. 5 stars for taste and service!

text: The flavored crust is so tasty and mouthwatering!  So much better than the pizza I grew up eating.  I'm so glad Hungry Howie's Pizza made it to Arkansas.  Establishment is very clean and the staff and manager, Ricci are so helpful and friendly.  I will be going back often.  Thank you Hungry Howie's Pizza!

text: This is my new favorite pizza place! The options for the flavored crust and all the toppings make the possibilities endless! Try a chicken bacon ranch with ranch crust or the three cheese pleaser with the Cajun crust for a little fun spice! ‚Ä¶More
